duties_responsibilities.duty: Responding to inquiries via phone call, SMS, online chat, email, and other communication channels.
Maintaining accurate records in lead tracking, CRM, and other software systems.
Scheduling appointments per the client's booking protocols and policies.
Educating patients on different products and services, discussing fees, pricing, programs, etc.
Providing cross-training and back-up support for other positions as required.
Ensuring strict HIPAA compliance and maintaining patient confidentiality.
Possibility of bilingual communication and assistance (English/Spanish).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, equivalent experience considered.
